text: Zhenzhu ceng jiayi en chong de zhexie xianzhi, shuyu a dan de houyi, shuyu wo shi (tamen) yu nu ha tongzhougongji zhe de (houyi), shuyu yi bo la xin he yi si la yi de houyi, shuyu wo suoyindao erqie xuanba de ren, dui tamen xuandu zhiren zhu de qishi de shihou, tamen fufu xiaqu koutou he kuqi.※§
